monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2017-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 15.6°C and salinity of 35.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2012m depth.
2017-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 14.3°C and salinity of 34.4. Deep water measurements extend to 2010m depth.
2017-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 12.5°C and salinity of 35.0. Deep water measurements extend to 2013m depth.
2017-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 8.6°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 4979m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
